mutants.code:
def longest_word_unique_letters(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    max_unique = 1
    for word in words:
        unique_letters = len(set(word))
        max_unique = max(max_unique, unique_letters)
    return max_unique

def longest_word_unique_letters(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    max_unique = -1
    for word in words:
        unique_letters = len(set(word))
        max_unique = max(max_unique, unique_letters)
    return max_unique

def longest_word_unique_letters(sentence):
    words = sentence.split()
    max_unique = 1
    for word in words:
        unique_letters = len(set(word))
        max_unique = max(max_unique, unique_letters)
    return max_unique
